web_snippets: Kyle Worley is a pastor, teacher, and writer. He is one of the hosts of the Knowing Faith podcast and the author of Home with God: Our Union with Christ.

Kyle Worley is a pastor, author, teacher, podcast host. He is the host of the Knowing Faith Podcast, alongside Jen Wilkin and JT English.
